artworks.title: Mona Lisa
artworks.description: Leonardo da Vinci's Mona Lisa is a portrait known for its enigmatic smile and sfumato technique.  It reflects Renaissance humanism and emphasizes individual beauty.
artworks.tooltip: Capture the subtle smile and soft colors. Note the light source.

artworks.title: The Starry Night
artworks.description: Van Gogh's The Starry Night depicts his view from an asylum window.  Its swirling sky and vibrant colors express his emotional turmoil and connection to nature.
artworks.tooltip: Focus on expressive brushstrokes and impasto. Use bold colors.

artworks.title: The Scream
artworks.description: Munch's The Scream expresses anxiety and dread.  The distorted figure against a vivid sky embodies alienation and psychological distress.
artworks.tooltip: Emphasize line and color to convey emotion. Note the swirling lines.

artworks.title: Impression, Sunrise
artworks.description: Monet's Impression, Sunrise exemplifies Impressionism, capturing fleeting moments and light effects. It depicts Le Havre harbor at dawn.
artworks.tooltip: Capture light and atmosphere with short brushstrokes. Note the reflections.

artworks.title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
artworks.description: Hokusai's The Great Wave is a woodblock print showing nature's power.  The giant wave dwarfs Mount Fuji, creating a sense of beauty and danger.
artworks.tooltip: Focus on dynamic composition and line. Contrast wave curves and boat lines.
